mapper.insert: insert into eden_user(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_nickname, user_image, user_gender, user_birth, user_phone, user_email, user_status, user_join_date, user_last_connection_date) values (eden_user_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_nickname}, 'default-user-image.jpg', #{user_gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, 'active', sysdate, sysdate)
